name: An Updated Red Potato Salad
author: misscait21
summary: My mom always makes this on requests for dinner or parties. It's so simple, yet all the flavors together really tantalize your palate. Red wine vinegar and sour cream really update this classic recipe.
ingredients: 1 ½ cups mayonnaise (such as Hellmann's®/Best Foods®)
salt and ground black pepper to taste
directions: Place potatoes into a large pot and cover with salted water; bring to a boil
Reduce heat to medium-low and simmer until tender, about 20 minutes
Transfer potatoes to a large bowl; stir in mayonnaise, sour cream, vinegar, sugar, onion, and celery seed until well coated
Gently mix in eggs and season with salt and black pepper
